input.sentences: it was a cold morning at -17 degrees celsius .
we had to close the trails for safety .
the pine trees were white with snow .
we used the tractor to clear the trails .
it was going to take all day to clear the snow away .
output.sentences: This morning was an early start for the family, early and cold.
The family went outside and they saw that all of the trails were closed due to the snow.
They decided to wander around aimlessly and found such beautiful sites to photograph.
They came across some farming equipment and thought the back drop made for too perfect a picture to pass up.
As they headed back to the house, they want to be sure they had a picture of where they were staying and how it looked covered with a blanket of snow.
